name: Lesson 1
title: Print a message
task: Hi! My name is Lilo, can you introduce yourself using the SAY statement?

name: Lesson 2
title: Declare a variable
task: I have a phone number. It is 0123456789. Can you put in a box? Can you also add my name in another box? My name is Foxy btw. Now print them!

name: Lesson 3
title: Arithmetic Operations
task: So you have 2 boxes. One contains my name. The other contains the text My name is. Concatenate their content using +. Print the result!

name: Lesson 4
title: Logic Operations
task: Try to add the content of the two given boxes. After that, try subtracting them. Print the results using say!

name: Lesson 5
title: If/Else Statement
task: If you are taller than me tell me that you are taller. Otherwise tell me you're shorter. Use the if statement
